Description:
Detects execution of the "esxcli" command with the "system" flag in order to retrieve information about the different component of the system. Such as accounts, modules, NTP, etc.

Author: Cedric Maurugeon
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: ESXi System Information Discovery Via ESXCLI
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%/esxcli' and command like '%system%') and (command like '% get%' or command like '% list%'))
